con:restRequest.name: CreateBooking
con:restRequest.con:request: {\r "header" : {\r "application" : "${DataSource#application}",\r "brand" : "${DataSource#brand}",\r "domainId" : "${DataSource#domainID}",\r "language" : "${DataSource#language}"\r },\r "countryCode" : "${DataSource#countryCode}",\r "sailingInfo" : {\r "shipCode" : "${#TestCase#ShipCode}",\r "sailDate" : "${#TestCase#SailDate}",\r "packageCode" : "${#TestCase#PackageCode}",\r "currencyCode" : "${DataSource#currencyCode}"\r },\r "reservations" : [\r {\r "cabin" : {\r "berthedCategoryCode" : "${#TestCase#Category}",\r "fareCode" : "${#TestCase#FareCode}",\r "pricedCategoryCode" : "${#TestCase#Category}",\r "waitListed" : "${DataSource#waitListed}",\r "accessible" : "${DataSource#accessible}",\r "number" : "${#TestCase#CabinNumber}"\r },\r "dining" : [\r {\r "sitting" : "${DataSource#sitting}",\r "sittingType" : "${DataSource#sittingType}",\r "sittingInstance" : "${DataSource#sittingInstance}"\r }\r ],\r "gratuitiesPrepaid" : "${DataSource#gratuitiesPrepaid}",\r "insurance" : {\r "code" : "CRCR",\r "optionIndicator" : "false"\r },\r "fareQualifiers" : {\r "seniorReqd" : "${DataSource#seniorReqd}",\r "militaryReqd" : "${DataSource#militaryReqd}",\r "policeReqd" : "${DataSource#policeReqd}",\r "fireFighterReqd" : "${DataSource#fireFighterReqd}"\r },\r "guestDetails" : [\r {\r "guestContact" : {\r "personalInfo" : {\r "name" : {\r "title" : "${DataSource#title}",\r "firstName" : "${DataSource#firstName}",\r "lastName" : "${DataSource#lastName}"\r },\r "age" : "${DataSource#age}",\r "birthDate" : "${DataSource#birthDate}",\r "gender" : "${DataSource#gender}",\r "nationality" : "${DataSource#nationality}"\r },\r "address" : {\r "address1" : "${DataSource#address1}",\r "city" : "${DataSource#city}",\r "stateCode" : "${DataSource#stateCode}",\r "postalCode" : "${DataSource#postalCode}",\r "countryName" : "${DataSource#countryName}"\r },\r "email" : "${DataSource#email}"\r }\r }\r ],\r "listOfCardPayments" : {\r "cardPayment" : [\r {\r "cardType" : "${DataSource#cardType}",\r "cardToken" : "${DataSource#cardToken}",\r "expireDate" : "${DataSource#expireDate}",\r "amount" : "200",\r "currency" : "${DataSource#currencyCode}",\r "extendPayments" : "${DataSource#extendPayments}",\r "contact" : {\r "firstName" : "${DataSource#card firstName}",\r "lastName" : "${DataSource#card lastName}",\r "address" : {\r "address1" : "${DataSource#card address1}",\r "city" : "${DataSource#card city}",\r "stateCode" : "${DataSource#card stateCode}",\r "postalCode" : "${DataSource#card postalCode}",\r "countryCode" : "${DataSource#card countryCode}",\r "countryName" : "${DataSource#card countryName}"\r }\r }\r }\r ]\r }\r }\r ],\r "courtesyHold" : "${DataSource#courtesyHold}"\r }

con:restRequest.name: updateBooking
con:restRequest.con:request: {\r "header" : {\r "application" : "${DataSource#application}",\r "brand" : "${DataSource#brand}",\r "domainId" : "${DataSource#domainID}"\r },\r "countryCode" : "${DataSource#countryCode}",\r "bookingId" : "${Properties_Booking#bookingId}",\r "bookingAccessToken" : "${BookingAcceesToken with Lock#bookingAccessToken}",\r "sailingInfo" : {\r "shipCode" : "${#TestCase#ShipCode}",\r "sailDate" : "${#TestCase#SailDate}",\r "packageCode" : "${#TestCase#PackageCode}",\r "currencyCode" : "${DataSource#currencyCode}",\r "vendorCode" : "${DataSource#brand}"\r },\r "reservation" : {\r "cabin" : {\r "berthedCategoryCode" : "${#TestCase#Category}",\r "fareCode" : "${#TestCase#FareCode}",\r "pricedCategoryCode" : "${#TestCase#Category}",\r "waitListed" : "${DataSource#waitListed}",\r "accessible" : "${DataSource#accessible}",\r "number" : "${#TestCase#CabinNumber}",\r "bedConfigCode" : "${Properties_Booking#bedConfigCode}"\r },\r "dining" : [\r {\r "sitting" : "${DataSource#sitting}",\r "sittingType" : "${DataSource#sittingType}",\r "sittingInstance" : "${DataSource#sittingInstance}",\r "waitListed" : "${DataSource#dine waitListed}",\r "familyTime" : "false",\r "crossRefAllowed" : "false"\r }\r ],\r "gratuitiesPrepaid" : "${DataSource#gratuitiesPrepaid}",\r "insurance" : {\r "code" : "CRCR",\r "optionIndicator" : "false",\r "defaultIndicator" : "false"\r },\r "fareQualifiers" : {\r "seniorReqd" : "${DataSource#seniorReqd}",\r "militaryReqd" : "${DataSource#militaryReqd}",\r "policeReqd" : "${DataSource#policeReqd}",\r "fireFighterReqd" : "${DataSource#fireFighterReqd}"\r },\r "reservationIdType" : {\r "id" : "${Properties_Booking#bookingId}",\r "lastModifyDateTime" : "${Properties_Booking#lastModifiedDateTime}",\r "status" : "${Properties_Booking#Booking_Status}"\r },\r "guestDetails" : [\r {\r "guestContact" : {\r "personalInfo" : {\r "name" : {\r "title" : "${DataSource#title}",\r "firstName" : "${DataSource#firstName}",\r "lastName" : "${DataSource#lastName}"\r },\r "age" : "${DataSource#age}",\r "birthDate" : "${DataSource#birthDate}",\r "gender" : "${DataSource#gender}",\r "nationality" : "${DataSource#nationality}"\r },\r "telephoneInfo" : {\r "telephoneNumber" : "9549549540",\r "telephoneType" : "${DataSource#telephoneType}"\r },\r "address" : {\r "address1" : "${DataSource#address1}",\r "city" : "${DataSource#city}",\r "stateCode" : "${DataSource#stateCode}",\r "postalCode" : "${DataSource#postalCode}",\r "countryName" : "${DataSource#countryName}"\r },\r "email" : "${DataSource#email}"\r },\r "cruiseDocument" : {\r "deliveryMethod" : "${DataSource#deliveryMethod}"\r }\r },\r {\r "guestContact" : {\r "personalInfo" : {\r "name" : {\r "title" : "${DataSource#title}",\r "firstName" : "${DataSource#firstName}",\r "lastName" : "${DataSource#lastName}"\r },\r "age" : "${DataSource#age}",\r "birthDate" : "${DataSource#birthDate}",\r "gender" : "${DataSource#gender}",\r "nationality" : "${DataSource#nationality}"\r },\r "telephoneInfo" : {\r "telephoneNumber" : "9549549540",\r "telephoneType" : "${DataSource#telephoneType}"\r },\r "address" : {\r "address1" : "${DataSource#address1}",\r "city" : "${DataSource#city}",\r "stateCode" : "${DataSource#stateCode}",\r "postalCode" : "${DataSource#postalCode}",\r "countryName" : "${DataSource#countryName}"\r },\r "email" : "${DataSource#email}"\r },\r "cruiseDocument" : {\r "deliveryMethod" : "${DataSource#deliveryMethod}"\r }\r }\r ],\r "listOfCardPayments" : {\r "cardPayment" : [\r {\r "cardType" : "${DataSource#cardType}",\r "cardToken" : "${DataSource#cardToken}",\r "expireDate" : "${DataSource#expireDate}",\r "amount" : "300.00",\r "currency" : "${DataSource#currencyCode}",\r "extendPayments" : "${DataSource#extendPayments}",\r "contact" : {\r "firstName" : "${DataSource#card firstName}",\r "lastName" : "${DataSource#card lastName}",\r "address" : {\r "address1" : "${DataSource#card address1}",\r "city" : "${DataSource#card city}",\r "stateCode" : "${DataSource#card stateCode}",\r "postalCode" : "${DataSource#card postalCode}",\r "countryCode" : "${DataSource#card countryCode}",\r "countryName" : "${DataSource#card countryName}"\r }\r }\r }\r ]\r }\r }\r }
